website_summaries.verdict: This inflatable is easy to decorate with and is an ideal pick for tree enthusiasts. Also makes a nice addition to any collection of Christmas inflatables.
pros: Tree theme is always fitting for Christmas decor
LED lights are bright and festive
cons: Design is on the plain side compared to some others, but it's still a cute inflatable

customer_reviews.title: Comes with hooks to hold on ground and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to install and comes with hooks to hold steady in ground. Looks really big in real life as well. Price is also reasonable if someone wants to use more than one inflatable decorations for their yard instead of spending massive amount of money on one item.
customer_reviews.author: steven salvatore

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Years ago I had a 6' inflatable Christmas tree that went through a very tough snowy and wet season and just wore out. I have been looking to replace it for a few years now, Once I found this one on Amazon I knew it was time to buy it. I have a large covered porch that I put this on with an inflatable Santa and inflatable North Pole sign.
customer_reviews.author: Baja Boy

customer_reviews.title: Meh not the best
customer_reviews.text: I just received this item and have only had it set up for a couple days. This isn’t my first inflatable, and unfortunately compared to some of my others it looks pretty cheap. I put it on my covered deck because I’m not sure how it would hold up in my yard. I don’t think it’s worth what I paid ($40).
customer_reviews.author: Anna banana

customer_reviews.title: Fail
customer_reviews.text: I love Christmas so much my favorite time of the year and I love these little up fun things. They just never seem to make it till actually Christmas and this one died the week before I don't know what it is the motor? I never know
customer_reviews.author: MyTribe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Just what I needed for my blow up collection.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Not enough lights. If the two gift boxes would light up it would make a difference. The colors are also too dark. Purchased the same type for Halloween and it was fine. This is super blah.
customer_reviews.author: Pat & Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Only lasted 2 weeks before the motor quit working and no longer inflated. Didn’t make it to Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie M.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy inflatable
customer_reviews.text: This Christmas inflatable worked perfectly during the Christmas season. The light inside the inflatable lasted the entire season and the inflatable stood up tall on rainy, windy days. Cant wait to use it next Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Spann

customer_reviews.title: XMAS BLOW UP
customer_reviews.text: FAN WENT OUT AT 45 DAYS AND RETURN POLICY WAS 30 DAYS.WHAT A WASTE OF MONEY.WILL STAY WITH WALMART
customer_reviews.author: leah GONZALEZ

customer_reviews.title: Great decoration
customer_reviews.text: Great outdoor decoration that I can use again next year.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Seidenfuss

customer_reviews.title: Xmas tree
customer_reviews.text: The inflatable was nice but stop working 2 weeks after I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: yazmin nieves

customer_reviews.title: Not enough lights
customer_reviews.text: It's cute but needs three sets of lights. There's only a set at the top and middle. The whole bottom tier and presents are dark.
customer_reviews.author: Dayla M Sparks

product_meta.title: Albrillo Christmas Inflatable Tree with LED Lights Indoor Outdoor Yard Lawn Decoration - Cute Fun Xmas Holiday Blow Up Party Display, 6 Foot Tall
feature_bullets: 6 Foot High Christmas Inflatables Blow up Tree. Just plug in this inflatable Christmas tree, it will be standing up to its full height in seconds, ready to happy and delight all your neighbors and guests
Built in LED Lights. Creating a better nighttime viewing and more fun, it has super bright LED lights in the whole decorations to give it a shifting, shimmering effect

Secure to the Ground. The Christmas Inflatable tree decorations include 5 ground stakes and 3 tethers and built in sandbags that makes it more stable. No need to worry that this Christmas Inflatable blow up indoor and outdoor tree will fly away with the wind

Easy to Use and Safe. 10ft power cord allows you to place and pop up this decoration anywhere you want. Certified for outdoors and Indoors uses only 12 volts, making it even safer. You can place this Christmas Outdoor Yard Garden Decorations in the garden, yard or party etc, bring a stronger feeling of Christmas atmosphere to your friends and family
Perfect Xmas Decoration. Albrillo Inflatable Christmas Decorations tree is ideal for decorating homes, offices, or even classrooms with a happy and prosperous festival

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars80 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
